tool_description: Generate screenshots of websites in JPEG or PNG. This can either be the desktop version, mobile version or the full page version of a website.
name: Website Screenshots
title: Website Screenshots

api_list.name: get
api_list.description: Creates a thumbnail for the given url.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the website you want to caputre. E.g. http://thumbnail.ws/ or https://www.google.com/.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The output format. Currently PNG and JPEG are supported.

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: How long to wait after the page has loaded to create a screenshot. Time in millisecond. Default is 2500.

optional_parameters.name: mobile
optional_parameters.description: If set to true a screenshot of the mobile website will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: fullpage
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, the entire page will be rendered.
